item.title: Bash scripting
item.description: Multi-line comments : ' This is a very neat comment in bash ' Output common lines between two files grep -Fxf file1 file2 # using grep sort file1 file2 | uniq -d # using sort Replace white space with underscore in filename for f in *; do mv "$f" `echo $f | tr ' ' '_'`; done Processing a large number of files To avoid the error Argument list too long:

item.title: Jupyter shortcuts and installation
item.description: Jupyter shortcuts Symbol Action y cell format -> code m cell format -> Markdown a Add cell above b Add cell below c copy cell v paste cell x cut cell d d delete cell z undo shift+z redo <space><space> new line --- horizontal line Jupyter kernels in MacOS Jupyter kernels are located in: ~/Library/Jupyter/kernels

item.title: MacOS tricks
item.description: Convert HEIC images to jpg or other formats # install imagemagick brew install imagemagick # convert a single image magick convert foo.HEIC foo.jpg # bulk convert multiple images magick mogrify -monitor -format jpg *.HEIC

item.title: Markdown Cheatsheet
item.description: Markdown Cheatsheet Headings size Heading 1 Markup : # Heading 1 Heading 2 Markup : ## Heading 2 Heading 3 Markup : ### Heading 3 Heading 4 Markup : #### Heading 4 Heading 5 Markup : ##### Heading 5 Heading 6 Markup : ###### Heading 6 Text formatting Common text Markup : Common text Emphasized text Markup : _Emphasized text_ or *Emphasized text* Strikethrough text

item.title: Video to gif
item.description: Mov to gif Particularly useful to animate screen records. ffmpeg -i input.mov -pix_fmt rgb8 -r 10 output.gif && gifsicle -O3 output.gif -o output.gif

item.title: Working with git
item.description: Bring your branch up-to-date with master git checkout master git fetch -p origin git merge origin/master git checkout <feature-branch> git merge master git push origin <feature-branch> Create a new branch and check out an old commit git checkout -b <new branch> <SHA-1> git add . git commit -m "added a new branch from old commit" git push --set-upstream origin <new branch> Tag code version git checkout main git pull git tag -a v0.

item.title: Working with tmux
item.description: Basics See: https://tmuxcheatsheet.com/ tmux new -s MySession tmux ls tmux attach -t MySession Shortcuts Ctrl + b + d: detach
